title: Come, you disconsolate, where'er you

author.name: John H. Sammis
author.bio: John H. Sammis was an American Presbyterian minister and hymn writer.

lyrics:
Come, you disconsolate, where'er you
languish;
come to the mercy seat, fervently kneel.
Here bring your wounded hearts, here tell
your anguish;
earth has no sorrows that heaven cannot
heal.
